arts.ttl: Fans stunned as Phil Foden is DENIED penalty after Man City star was wiped out by Fabian Schar - with VAR clearing Newcastle defender's challenge
arts.sum: As Foden shot for goal, Schar had attempted to put in a last ditch tackle on the England international and made contact with his left foot, but the challenge was ultimately cleared by VAR.
